title: Sci-Fi Guns Sounds
description: 146 modern guns sound effects divided in: Electric revolver, cannon gun, blaster rifle, low gun, alien guns, automatic gun,  old shotgun and old cannon shots, explosive gun, grenades, compressed air gun, and many more...
longDescription:
Sci-fi Guns Sounds

146 modern guns sound effects divided in more than 15 different types of guns:

- Electric Revolver

- Cannon Gun

- Blaster Rifle

- Low Gun

- Alien Guns

- Automatic Gun

- Old Shotgun and Old Cannon Shots

- Explosive Gun

- Grenades

- Compressed Air Gun

- And many more... Check the tracklist PDF to see the full list of sounds included in the pack

 

YouTube preview (hear the audio preview of the 146 SFX)

Soundcloud Preview (hear the audio preview of the 146 SFX)

Tracklist PDF

 

This pack can be complemented with:

Sci-Fi UI Sounds

Footsteps Sounds


More about the pack:

- Apart from shot sounds, there are reloading & handling sounds

- This SFX are suitable for Sci-Fi games but also for warfare, modern warfare ones.

- All you'll ever need regarding Sci-Fi Gun Sounds

  

[Authors]

  • Sam Dutton-Taylor (samdt21@gmail.com)
  • Audio Alchemist
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  There are singe-shot sounds but also loops (Rotary cannon)
  •  Intuitive file naming
  •  There's also the ''Stab'' sound and the ''Hit Marker'' sound.


Number of Audio Waves: 146

Number of Audio Cues: 146

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 2 minutes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dwWCuay4zmn2p6LluNT6Pu7sxadkNpvn/view
